Name: Tobacco
SeedDescription: Plant these in the spring or summer. Takes 7 days to mature.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plantalas en la primavera o verano, tardan 7 días en madurar.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanzen Sie diese im Frühjahr oder Sommer. Die Reifung dauert 7 Tage.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.pt: Plante-as na primavera ou verão. Leva 7 dias para amadurecer.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 春天或夏天播种。7天成熟，
